name: Gil Sharone
description:
'''Gil Sharone''' (born June 2, 1978) is an American [[drummer]] and member of the rock bands [[Stolen Babies]], [[Team Sleep]], [[Marilyn Manson (band)|Marilyn Manson]] and formerly [[The Dillinger Escape Plan]]. He was also a fill in for the punk rock [[Supergroup (music)|supergroup]] [[+44 (band)|+44]]. He is the twin brother of [[Rani Sharone]], also of Stolen Babies.

Sharone is highly regarded as one of the most versatile touring/session drummers in the world, due to his work on classic-styled [[ska]], [[rocksteady]] and [[reggae]], while also working in [[punk rock]] and [[industrial metal]].
